scenes.background: You decided to make sure the task is done right. [Bob] looks slightly annoyed.
scenes.description: 'I get it, but do you really think this is the best use of your leave?' He raises an eyebrow.

options.text: You're right. Maybe I should step back and let you handle it.
options.analysis: You show good self-regulation by considering stepping back, but empathy is lower as you leave the task to your colleague.

options.text: I understand your concern, but I want to see this through to the end.
options.analysis: You show high emotional perception and empathy by staying involved, but it might affect your self-regulation and motivation.

options.text: I'll stay a while longer, but let's figure out a way to speed things up.
options.analysis: You balance your time off with work demands, showing good social skills, but emotional perception and motivation could be improved.
